frames.caption: A massive tsunami wave looms over a bustling cityscape, threatening the high-rise buildings. People and vehicles are seen evacuating the city via a crowded bridge under a dark, stormy sky.
frames.description: The scene depicts a dramatic and chaotic evacuation as a gigantic wave approaches a densely populated urban area. The atmosphere is tense and urgent, with people and cars moving frantically to escape the impending disaster.

frames.caption: A dramatic scene unfolds as a helicopter hovers over a flooded cityscape, with skyscrapers partially submerged in turbulent waters. A large explosion with billowing smoke is visible among the buildings, adding to the chaos. A person in tactical gear is seen from behind, observing the scene from inside the helicopter.
frames.description: The image depicts a catastrophic event in a city, likely a natural disaster or attack, with floodwaters engulfing the urban landscape. The presence of a helicopter and a person in tactical gear suggests a rescue or reconnaissance mission.

summary: Nature: tsunami, ocean, stormy sky. Objects: buildings, bridge, vehicles, helicopter, skyscrapers. Actions: evacuation, driving, flying, hovering, flooding. Emotions: urgency, panic, chaos. Scenes: urban, disaster, urban disaster, flooded city. Concepts: natural disaster, apocalypse, disaster, rescue mission. People: person in tactical gear
